attributes.action: Refer all those MPs whose expense claims have breached the Parliamentary Code of Conduct to the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards for investigation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Parliamentary Code of Conduct states that Members shall observe the principle of "Selflessness", which is described as "Holders of public office should take decisions solely in terms of the public interest. They should not do so in order to gain financial or other material benefits for themselves, their family, or their friends."

Where MPs have acted in their own self interest and gained financially, they have breached the code of conduct and should be referred to the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards for investigation.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
